channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Marsland road is a liability, 8th July
item.description:
Seacombe Road and Lewis Road were resurfaced so why wasn't Marsland Road? The patchwork done on this road is crumbling and drivers are constantly having to dodge more issues on this road as time goes on. Please treat this as an urgent request as this is a key road for the local area that will cause damage to vehicles. Enough with the patches! Needs full resurfacing
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Marsland Road, Golden Valley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Single yellow lines/parking restriction signs, 8th July
item.description:
280 Hatherley Road to the corner of Caernarvon Road. Both sides of the road. There are parking restriction signs but no lines to highlight these restrictions.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 290, Hatherley Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned roadworks signage, 8th July
item.description:
These signs left by United utilities have been there for months, they are becoming overgrown and will cause serious damage to any verge mowing.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Barrow Hill, Churchdown, Tewkesbury

item.title: Roadworks sign left by Network Rail., 7th July
item.description:
Roadworks sign on pavement by gate leading to railway line in Shelburne Road, just before junction with Lansdown Road. Network Rail were working there a few days ago but now presumably finished.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shelburne Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped stool, 7th July
item.description:
Has been here about two months. Historically I'd have taken to the recycling centre myself but can't as it's closed and the other is a bit too far to make it make sense!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Granville Street, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping, 7th July
item.description:
The contractors you hired to cut the prickly hedge at the bottom of Gristmill Close have literally dragged the cuttings down the path and the road and have dumped them in the alley. This is not acceptable due to the amount of dogs that get walked down there. If my dog gets one of the thorns in his feet and ends up at the vets I will be sending you the invoice.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 35, Gristmill Close, Springbank, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Barrier damage by car going into drainage ditch, pedestrian unable to use footpath., 7th July
item.description:
Barrier damaged on Stoke Road, outside Duckstone House, Dean Lane, Stoke Orchard, GL52 7RX. Vehicle has crashed into the barrier which has caused the footpath to be closed off for over 3 weeks, this is a danger hazard for pedestrians and also with barriers now in the drainage ditch may cause flooding as build up will occur as the flow of water will be compromised.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stoke Road, Stoke Orchard, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface
